text: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيۡلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطۡـٔٗا وَأَقۡوَمُ قِيلًا
translation: Indeed, worship at night is more effective[3] and more conducive to proper recitation[4].
footnotes:
[3] Or "getting up at night is more difficult...," meaning that it can only be done by sincere believers.
 [4] i.e., for reciting, hearing, and understanding of the Qur’an.
